channel.title: Sheriff being occupied without butler in game
channel.description:
#### What happened? I was sheriff. I got poisoned d4 and after this both my checks failed because it said I was occupied. We executed physician due to this (I failed to check him) and eventually lost the game. There wasn't any butler in game and illusionist got executed way before this. Probably this
#### What was SUPPOSED to happen? My checks should have been done.
#### Steps to reproduce:
#### Comments: Unfortunately I didn't save any screenshots. This game ended approx. 20:10 UTC 30th January and my in-game nickname is Thad. Probably poison now prevents sheriff from checks? Definitely a bug.

item.title: Sheriff being occupied without butler in game
item.dc:creator: Wolfy
item.description:
Fair enough. Decided as a suggestion anyway. I hope this gets sorted for you soon then

Read full topic

item.description:
I am 99% sure there wasn’t a poacher cause I am aware of this ability.

Read full topic

item.title: Sheriff being occupied without butler in game
item.dc:creator: Wolfy
item.description:
It’s probably not a bug. Did you have a poacher in your game, because if there was, then they were probably the issue you were facing.

https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/375575617854373889/408000682109435914/unknown.png

Read full topic
